6e79dfc9-7d8d-4b54-a879-ed85352c83bb.description: Earners of the Akamai Segmentation GCSA badge have completed the Akamai Segmentation GCSA Training course. This course equips the Guardicore Administrator with the best practices to use and operate the Guardicore Centra platform. GCSA graduates confidently use the system independently to implement and continue their security use cases. GCSA covers Guardicore Centra’s core feature set: Visibility, Micro-Segmentation, Breach Detection, and Insight Capabilities.
6e79dfc9-7d8d-4b54-a879-ed85352c83bb.name: Akamai Segmentation GCSA

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the virtual instructor-led training “GCSA” course, capped off by completing a lab to actively implement labeling schema and completing a segmentation project on the “Akamai-Guardicore Centra” product.
Pass the end-of-class certification exam to ensure proper retention of the information taught in the course.

e4bb300d-9e74-4008-acbc-6362988919fa.description: The GCSE Course equips the operational owner of the Akamai-Guardicore system with the skills and information required to perform platform-related administrative and maintenance tasks. GCSE graduates are trained to manage the overall operational stability of the Akamai-Guardicore Centra environment. The program covers the following topics: platform and components configuration, integration with third-party tools, platform health checking, troubleshooting, and common maintenance tasks.
e4bb300d-9e74-4008-acbc-6362988919fa.name: Akamai Segmentation GCSE

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the virtual instructor-led training “GCSE” course, capped off by completing a lab to actively implement role-based access control permission schema and installing and troubleshooting agents on the “Akamai-Guardicore Centra” product.
Pass the end-of-class certification exam to ensure proper retention of the information taught in the course.
